title: [Health] Priority micronutrient density in foods — We find that the top sources of priority micronutrients (iron, zinc, folate, vitamin A, calcium, and vitamin B12) are organs, small fish, dark green leafy vegetables, bivalves, crustaceans, goat, beef, eggs, milk, canned fish with bones, mutton, and lamb
[Neuroscience] A human brain vascular atlas reveals diverse mediators of Alzheimer’s risk
